attributes.action: abolish Bourbon Biscuit. I really dont like them and feel they are secretly plotting to take over the world. Gordon Brown also is really quite partial to them...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bourbon biscuits are evil. Not only do they taste horrible they have a secret dark past. Bourbon biscuits were in cahoots with Hitler and they passed on valuable information about shelf stock in the UK during the war. Borbon biscuits also pursuaded Ghengis Khan to rampage. Before Bourbons he  was a gentle giant. These biscuits need to be taken away before they do any more harm. Please sign my petition. Please also see my petition on Marmite.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
